meanings.definition: Arranged in or extending along a straight or nearly straight line.
meanings.sent1: The linier rows of trees made the orchard look very organized.
meanings.sent2: The linier design of the building gave it a modern and sleek appearance.
meanings.sent3: The linier pattern on the wallpaper made the room feel like a giant ruler.
meanings.sent4: Her linier train of thought led her directly to the solution.
meanings.sent5: The linier arrangement of books on the shelf made it easy to find what she needed.
